transcript:
Customer: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Aji namaskar, main Abhishek baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Badhiya hai sir, aap bataye aap kaise hain?
Executive: Main bhi badhiya hun sir. Last mein aapse connect hua tha na email bounce ke regarding. To wo abhi dikkat nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi abhi theek chal raha hai. Sir mere phone mein problem ho gayi wo iPhone mein password lag gaya. Number kisi ka save nahi hai kuch pata nahi lag rahi kiski call aa rahi hai kiski nahi. Ab wo thodi privacy yahi hai iPhone ki ke wo password agar ek bar aap bhul gaye to ya miss ho gaya to usko care hi kar sakta hai bas.
Executive: Achha achha jaise abhi mera number aapke pass aa gaya. Number kaun sa dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Mere ko number dikh raha hai 80488.
Executive: Company ka hai ki personal number hai?
Customer: Company ka hai.
Executive: Last mein usme kya 94 hai?
Customer: Last mein hai ye starting se bata raha hun 8048891363.
Executive: Okay okay to system se call gayi hai actually.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: System ke through call gayi hui hai. To main aapka personal number add kar deta hun ek bar dobara se apna number boliye sir.
Customer: 9758
Executive: 975822
Customer: 229758 right?
Executive: Hanji hanji right.
Executive: Okay okay. To maine ek bar hi aur bhej diya usme save kar lena.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai.
Executive: Aur baki business wagera kaise chal raha hai sir?
Customer: Business to dekhiye sir IndiaMART se bhi matlab main buyleads to consume kar hi raha hun permanently kar raha hun time bhi de raha hun lekin buyers abhi tak koi purchase nahi kiya hai. Ye man lo aisa pehli bar buyer ne koi maal purchase nahi kiya hai abhi tak bhi.
Executive: Ek minute theek hai.
Executive: Ye cheez ko main samajh sakta hun buyer abhi tak koi connect nahi ho pa raha hai aapse. Right?
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: To iske liye hanji iske liye to hum dekh sakte hain aapke hisab se bhi kya issue aa raha hai. Buyer connect nahi ho raha wo to theek hai kyun aisa ho raha hai aap bata sakte hain ki aapko kya lagta hai?
Customer: Chalna hai?
Customer: Abhi 4 baje to aai jayega na kitni der hai. Jaun main?
Executive: Hanji sir. Ha nahi main ye janna chahta hun ki aapke hisab se aapko kya lag raha hai ki ye kya issue aa raha hai ki buyer mujhse cheeze purchase nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Nahi issues to main kuch bhi nahi keh sakta issue ke liye to kuch bhi nahi keh sakta sir dekhiye galti aapki bhi nahi hai aap bhi active ho main bhi profile bhi dekhta hun meri bhi nahi hai IndiaMART ki bhi nahi hai IndiaMART ki nahi ho rahi hai aapke success ke hisab se success marketing ho rahi hai theek hai lekin buyer ki or se jaise koi buyer aata hai kai bar aisa issue hota hai ki uske paas sir price kya hai aap mujhe main photo bhej do aapne bhej diya usne kisi dusre se compare kiya uska kam nikala usse connect kar liya ya usse hota hai to aapke price janne ke liye call karta hai kai bar sirf price janne ke liye bhi aate honge log. Hai na?
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Call jo aati hai wo to filhal kam hai koi nahi. Call jo aati hai wo kuch miss hone ki wajah se wo bhi kam aa rahi hai usko chhod dete hain.
Customer: Call to hai hi nahi sir. Nahi main miss to karta hi nahi sir sari consume karta hun call bhi receive karta hun aisa to hai hi nahi. But call ka jo mam ne mujhe target bataya tha ki call hi call aayengi aap par per day do char call to aayengi hi buyers ki. Call ka to main sir hai hi nahi call to sahi bata raha hun main aapko.
Executive: Isme to kya November month ki char call padi hai aapki.
Customer: Miss hui hui hai call receive hui hui hai sir.
Executive: Teen miss hui hai ek receive hui hai.
Customer: Nahi back call karta hun main unko miss hone ke baad back call kar deta hun main unko. Aisa hota hai drive karta hua hota hun to phone nahi uthata fir aap dekho agar call list wo aa rahi hai to main message record mein jane ke baad unka number aa jata hai na show ho jata hai company details number sab show ho jata hai to fir main unko return call karta hun.
Executive: Theek hai aap unko return call karte hain ye bhi theek hai main samajh gaya aur jitne logo se aapne connect kiye ek kami mere hisab se jo dikh rahi hai agar aapne notice kiya ho to mujhe nahi pata ye hai ki jaise jin logo se aap connect karte ho sir right rating alag hota hai wo apne experience hisab se pasand dete hain theek hai jin logo se connect karte ho follow up unse aapka completely nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Hain?
Customer: Follow up like jaise agar last month ki baat kare na 55 aapke pass matlab lead se connect kiya aapne 55 inquiry thi aapke pass theek hai including call to unme se sirf 27 logo ne aapka follow up hua hai.
Customer: Main na ye ye ek to wo iski thodi si problem ho rahi hai main abhi bahar hun na to baith kar ke baat karunga to behtar samajh mein aayega aapse bhi baat karta hun main.
Executive: Baith ke baat kar sakte hain kyunki theek hai batao kitne time connect kar loon?
Customer: Abhi main service center ja raha hun iPhone ka mera password lock hai phone open nahi ho raha hai theek hai na fir uske baad main aapse connect karta hun theek hai.
Executive: Okay okay mujhe laga aapne bola mobile kharab ho gaya uska password nahi mil raha iPhone ka thoda aapko jaldi jana padega.
Customer: Han wo sir agar ek bar password bhi aapki privacy iPhone ki privacy to aapko malum hi hai.
Executive: Han bilkul koi nahi sham ko ek bar connect kar leta hun uske bare mein ek bar.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai have a great day sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's iPhone is locked due to password.

- No purchases made despite consuming buyleads.

- Few calls received.

- Follow-up not completed with all leads.



Resolution:

- Executive added customer's personal number.

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive offered to reconnect in the evening.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect after visiting service center.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, password, follow up, iphone
